attributes.title: Soooo slooowww
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and after five minutes my phone started to glitch and turn off and was really slow. How can this app do shush a thing if it’s owned by dish a rich guy. You look like a Cheeto and your app is slow pick a struggle. If I could give 0 stars I would.

attributes.title: Wow
attributes.review: One of the worst apps everrr. Once I started using this app it seemed fine but after 10 mi it’s many pop ups came up on my phone and stuff started to pop up outside of the app. Most annoying thing on my phone and would not recommend.

attributes.title: Inadequate and unfit of an app
attributes.review:
This app did not meet the standards of what a competent and functioning app should be like.

 It did not have the abilities to satisfy its users; constantly malfunctioning, and shutting down right when opening. Suggests one thing and have a completely ulterior motive. 

This platform is unjust to be an app.

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: My little brother opened this app and immediately began shouting wi to screams. I didn’t understand what happened but then noticed that there was a clown on the screen. My little brother hates clowns and especially the color orange. I give this a once star because it’s not intended for all ages.

attributes.title: I lost my husband because of this app
attributes.review: My husband was looking over my shoulder one day and saw me looking at pictures of Trump on the Trump 2020 app. He said “Why are you looking at a picture of a human tortoise?” and then accused me of being into b*stiality. Now he thinks I’m attracted to reptiles and got a divorce from me. I hate this app!

attributes.title: CHINA. Stole my Information!!!
attributes.review: This app is owned by China! They stole my information and kidnapped my pet alligator! I’m suing this company for everything they own. Ever since I downloaded it, I’ve been having bad luck and lost all of my lottery tickets! Now I can’t even vote for #Trump2020 because my ID was stolen. All because this CHINA app!!!!!

attributes.title: Too Glitchy
attributes.review: The app, as soon as I opened it was glitching out constantly. I really think they need to look into these glitches. I wanted to get the app to keep up with the presidents campaign but I ended up getting my phone glitching out. 10/10 do not recommend

attributes.title: Teen Dating Simulator!!!!!!!!!!!!! >>>>:::((((((
attributes.review: I downloaded This app so i could follow my favoRite person dUring his campaign. iMagine my surPrise when i open the app and it’S a teen dating simUlator!! i thought i was getting a Chance to follow my president, not stalK a bunch of teenS!! oh well, at least the dating simulator is better than trump himself. UNDOWNLOADING!!!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER CREATED!!
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app all I saw were pictures of oranges doing the dirty with CHEETOS!!! Super inappropriate! But that’s not even the worst part! At night I was trying to fall asleep when I heard weird noises coming from my fridge. Those SAME EXACT ORANGES AND CHEETOS WERE DOING IT IN MY FRIDGE! I gasped in disgust. If I were able to give this app a zero star review I would.
